Sample.Hybridization-Protocol: Slides were cross-linked in a Stratalinker (Stratagene), using the “auto-link” function at 3000ujoulesx100. Prior to hybridization, slides were pre-hybridized for 2 hours at room temperature in 0.2% SDS then rinsed in filtered water (10 sec) then in 70%.EtOH (5sec). Slides were dried by centrifugation at 1000rpm for 3 min. Labeled cDNA was mixed to 500ul of Ambion SlideHyb#3 hybridization buffer (cat# AM8863). Hybridization mix was spin at 15,000xg for 5 min, denatured at 98C for 2 min and kept at 70C until loading onto the slide. Hybridization was performed in the Agilent hybridization chambers and oven for 18hrs, at 50C, rotation setting at 7. At the end of hybridization, slides were disassembled in 0.2xSSC/0.1%SDS, washed for 15 min at RT in 0.2xSSC/0.1%SDS, then 15min at RT in 0.1xSSC and dried by centrifugation at 1000rpm for 3 min.
Sample.Scan-Protocol: Arrays were scanned using an Axon 4200AL scanner (Axon Instruments Inc) using the “autoscanning” function.
Sample.Data-Processing: Images were analyzed using GenePix Pro 6.0 (Axon Instruments Inc) for background subtraction and processing. GeneSpring software (v. 7.3.1) was used for analysis

Series.Title: Mycobacterium smegmatis: CarD depletion (mgm1703) vs Control (mgm1701)
Series.Summary: Transcriptional profiling of Mycobacterium smegmatis comparing the effects of wild type levels of CarD expression with CarD depletion. Transcriptional profile of the mgm1701 control strain was compared with that of mgm1703, a strain where CarD transcription is regulated by a Tet-On system. Both strains were grown in the absence of anhydrotetracline for 13 hours in nutrient rich broth to allow for depletion of CarD transcription in mgm1703.
Series.Overall-Design: Two condition experiment, control (mgm1701) vs CarD depletion (mgm1703). 3 biological replicates of each strain.
